term.title: cut-on filter

item.text: Optical device that only permits the transmission of radiation of wavelengths shorter than a specified wavelength.

notes.item: Although more rare than the cut-off filters, there are a few cut-on filters on the market.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 319 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)
